If in Seoul one must go. Very romantic and extra ordinary place in this planet ..So much to do so spend some full day ..Clay museum is very fascinating...lol Beautiful autumn foliage While the autumn foliage on Nami Island is lovely, you must be prepared to put up with the hordes of tourists that pour in on day trips. Starting from the road leading to the ferry terminal to Nami Island, snaking queue of cars have to wait patiently for carpark lots. Next will be the queue for the ferry. While everything moved fairly quickly and efficiently, it does mar the experience somewhat. It will probably be more enjoyable if one spends the night or arrives very early to beat the crowds.

From Seoul to Serenity: A Day on Nami Island Nami Island is a charming and peaceful escape from the busy city life. Surrounded by nature, it offers beautiful tree-lined paths, scenic river views, and a calm, romantic atmosphere. Each season brings its own magic, from cherry blossoms in spring to colorful leaves in autumn. It’s a lovely spot for walking, taking photos, and enjoying simple pleasures in nature.
Nami Island - yeah Was great to see the island and nature. Wish I could have seen blossoms! This was worth it for at least once. Very touristy also.

A Scenic Escape Influenced by K-Drama A visit to Nami Island was pretty much non-negotiable for us; my wife, sisters, and niece are all huge K-drama fans, so it was bound to happen. We visited in August, on a sweltering August afternoon (the humidity in Seoul is no joke!) as part of a tour. The hour drive from the city and subsequent short ferry ride over was a nice escape from the city.Nami Island is named after General Nami; a figure who fought courageously but, tragically, died at 26. History aside, once on the island, we found it quite busy, for a weekday, but not unbearably so; I can imagine what weekends are like. The place has a whimsical charm, filled with manicured gardens, art installations, and winding trails under pine trees that give you a break from the heat. Despite a lot of the landscaping being man-made, it feels surprisingly natural.Exploring Nami doesn’t take too long; we did so in two hours on foot and eventually renting electric scooters. Some of our party took up some boat activities. We passed by a few cafés and restaurants (mostly Korean cuisine), so you won’t go hungry or thirsty.Is it a romantic haven? Maybe, if you catch it on a quieter day. For us, it was more about soaking in a bit of nature, taking family photos (with some members going wild with Instagram pics), and ticking that K-drama box. If you’re in Seoul and want an easy day trip out of town, Nami Island offers exactly that—just be prepared for the humidity if you visit in the thick of summer.

beware of pickpockets on Nami Island place is beautiful but becareful of pickpockets .Of all places ..my daugther lost her handphone to pickpockets.It was inside her handbag.We travelled safely to places like Thailand ,Vietnam ,Cambodia,China and Europe and it's so disappointing to have lost it to a pickpocket in Korea ..of all places.Even the crowded streets of Myeongdong was safer.Pickpockets should be targeting tourists...He/she was very fast to escape via the ferry and was soon transferring between train stations further and further away.It's my 3rd visit to this beautiful country..very disappointed and lodging a police report is another hassle.Not many spoke English.In the end,I lodge the report at Incheon Airport Great for a walk and enjoy the scenery Nami island is only a short ferry ride away and it is to spend half a day exploring the island. The scenery is beautiful and we can still see some autumn leaves. There are small cafes and shops along the way and you can even rent a bicycle. I would love to visit it again during spring.

Must visit places ❄️ Nami island is a beautiful place to visit and photos of the islands 🏝️Prepare more times for yourself and family or friends here and the island is so much convenient for you to have fun, food and souvenir 🎁 Small island with lots of big old trees A tiny island. Pretty and good for spend a afternoon but not as pretty as expected. Full of beautiful and big trees but also has some tiny bugs flying around. It is easy to identify that there were many k drama were filmed there.Besides ferry, there is an alternative to cross the river to arrive the island, zip line, and it seems very fun.The island has some art pieces around.Don't be rush if you want to go there. You may need to wait for two ferries for your return.There are many clean toilets on the island.There is a beautiful Starbucks on your way to the ferry pier which you may not want to miss too.
SKIP this one.

Tourist trap.  This is where they filmed some of the scenes in k-drama “Winter Sonatas”. Your ticket gives you the round trip boat ride to this tiny island in the middle of the river. The boat ride takes about 5 minutes each way. There are places to drink and eat on this island.  I have been to municipal parks that are better than this.  AVOID.  Most visitors are foreigners.

Our tour guides made this a wonderful trip Our tour guides made this an excellent experience. The reviews for Nami Island was mixed at best so we started out with some doubts. Our tour guides Tomas and Alex met us with bright smiles in a rainy day. They explained the day. They were upbeat, encouraging and very attentive. They got us there early so we were almost the only folks in the ferry boat. It was a short trip to the island but it was beautiful. Their descriptions of the history of the place made it come even more alive. We had the island almost to ourselves. The rain had almost stopped by the time we got to the island so we were able to explore, take pictures, ask questions to our heart’s content. We had a wonderful lunch in an almost empty restaurant then we were on to the Garden of Morning Calm. That place was absolutely idyllic. Tomas and Alex walked around the well thought out, planned a d executed grounds that look like they effortlessly appeared that way by nature (or fairy dust). We saw ostrich and peacock. There were fountains and babbling brooks and waterfalls. The peacefulness crept into your soul.I thank VIP tours and especially Tomas and Alex for a truly memorable day!

Go for nature and any k-drama fans Having been in the region I thought I'd check out this well known Nami Island.I did some quick research and decided that it probably wasn't going to be for me, not being overly familiar with k-drama.The place gets very crowded and very difficult to take photos at times. But the island itself surprisingly is actually quite nice, think about it like a large picturesque park. Gardens are well maintained and designed and some really nice scenary around the island.It does take a little while to walk around and I allowed 2 hours to completely explore the island quickly. It was worth it, but I wouldn't go out of my way to visit here. For a relaxing half day trip from Seoul it's really not too bad but don't expect much.You can rent bicycles and electric vehicles to get around the island quicker but for the unitiated it's probably too much of a hype and not really worth it.I enjoyed my experience mostly nevertheless.

Must visit Very beautiful place. Recommend everyone to visit this place if you are coming to Seoul.They have options to go around the island like a family bike, Segway or a bicycle.We also attended a live music performance. It was very nice and my kid enjoyed it.Very scenic place and you can take beautiful spots for taking photos.

Peaceful Nami island is bigger than I expected. Don't expect to be entertained while here or else you'll be disappointed. It's a very relaxing and peaceful spot. Lots of scenic areas. It's incredible how many tents were set up. I guess some people like to camp on the island. There are also some lodges and hard roofs over your head if you wish to stay on the island. There are a few restaurants. My recommendation is to pay for a golf cart tour around the island instead of the mini train through the island. The former takes about 30 minutes. Once you've returned to your starting point, you can stroll through the island. Overall, it would take around 2-3 hours.

Spent a nice 2 hours Came here on a day tour from SeoulNice area. The ticket gives you a return trip by ferry.I ended up with about 2 hours probably would have liked 3 hours.I got to do the main loop of the island. Well set up for visitors. Beautiful natural areas, plenty of places to eat and buy souvenesThere are hotels to stay at and plenty of actives to get involved with.You could easily spend the whole day here if you want.

Grossly overrated, noisy and crowded Fortunately the island was more or less on our way and we did not make a special trip there. It is certainly not worth it and even hardly a visit when passing by. Actually it is just a crowded park with admittedly nice nature but spoilt by the crowds and music all around. You can see the same in many other places.

Beautiful place to visit It’s a beautiful place with lots to see and to do. It’s worth a trip if you’re visiting Korea.  Even though it’s a bit pricey, there are many places to eat. I went on a weekend so it was a bit crowded but didn’t have to wait to get on a short ferry ride.

Zipwire thrill, pretty island We got buses and trains there.I'd advise a cab to/from Gapyeong Station to the ferry/zipwire. If you travel via that station.It saves waiting for the bus and also being wedged on the bus. I didn't think they could fit anymore people on the bus. ..until they did.The trip felt like a fair bit of travel from Myeong-dong, Seoul for a day trip that was simply ok. But it would depend on what you are hoping to see or do.Lots of pretty nature walks. See some animals like chipmunks, peacocks, red squirrels, butterflies etc.Some bikes to hire. Some Swan shaped pedalos..some cafes and restaurantsSome art installations.The main reason for us visiting was to zipwire onto it. So for that reason alone- the daytrip there was worth it.We arrived at the  zipwire location. Bought tickets for the family zipwire (there is also a more adventurous faster zip wire to a different island)Waited about 40mins for our time slot and just browsed some shops.We were permitted to wear out rucksacks on our front whilst on then zipwire.It's about a minute or so of thrill seeking.It felt quite high and fast which was fun.Lovely views as you zip wire across the water.The rest of the island is pretty. Some great views. But it was very very busy.To ensure we had good weather - we went on a Saturday. Not only tourists present but locals too. It was also Holy Hai on the day. It was super busy. Lots of people. The ferries were packed. The cafes/restaurants were full.Had we known and done more research in advance we probably would have taken a small picnic/ bunch of snacks. Or even participated in Holy Hai as it looked like great fun.I also would have chosen to go on a weekday where we heard it is quieter.Overall a good day and good memories.

Boring Sad to say it was one of the most boring places I have visited. Crushed into the boat to get there, nothing on the island to do, totally devoid of anything interesting and after 20 minutes wanted to leave. I suggest you really consider some place more worthwhile Thanks K Thanks K for this trip you are so professional and friendly. We enjoyed with her and we did all things on time as we expected.

We have been here before, in Autumn, and the place was beautiful with yellow and red autumn leaves.  This time, we visited in late December and everything is bare.  There is no snow, only bare branches.  Doesn't look very attractive.  The famous lanes are crowded with people.  You can't really take a decent picture.Besides, it's really cold and not many places you can warm yourself up.Don't visit in winter (unless it has been snowing I guess?) Great venue to enjoy the beautiful autumn colours Another great venue to view autumn leaves with many opportunities to take beautiful photographs.  There are many nice cafes and resturants in the island where you can have a cup of coffee or meal and ice cream and just relax and take in the beautiful autumn colours.  We took a day tour from KKday to Garden of Morning Calm and then to Nami Island.  Our tour guide Cecilai was excellent.  Just before we took a ferry to the island, she brought to have lunch at a dakgalbi restaurant that was very good.  One of the highlights of our trip to Korea.

Amazing place Nami Island should be in your list when you visit SoKor. The ambiance is truly exceptional. There’s a lot to see and experience in this small island. The art installations are mind-blowing! Truly, a worthy place to visit!

Nice island visit but very crowded We visited here as part of a group and by the time we got there it was very busy on the island.The boats are frequent though. We only spent around 45 mins in the island which isn't really a lot of time so would recommend coming here on your own if you can so you are not rushing as part of a group with very limited time here.There is lots to see and plenty of spots to take Autumn 🍂 photos.There are some emus here too but they do not look very friendly so be careful if you have children.They have live music here too.

Beautiful in autumn but beware of crowds It was beautiful in autumn. Like many other reviews mentioned, it is very crowded. The island was filled with both tourists and locals. There will always be a queue to board the ferry arriving or departing the island (you can also choose to zipline into the island instead of taking the boat).The crowds are mostly congregated along the famous path of trees. The island is huge and have a lot more nature to offer. I enjoyed exploring the island in autumn weather.There was also a Moomin exhibition and souvenir store during my time there. Not sure if this is a limited time or permanent arrangement.

Nami Island Nov Visited Nami in November. Weather was kind to us with pretty cool temperature and no rain in our day of visit. Travel from Myeongdong to Gapyeong station took 2 hours. Be mindful you could be left standing on the TRX train if you buy your tickets on the spot. Either take a ferry or zip line to the island. Entrance fee to Nami is included in the ferry ticket price, hence there is no need to buy entrance ticket separately. Island was crowded but still beautiful despite the fact the leaves on the trees are not so colourful as expected in Autumn probably due to global climate change. There isn’t much of food variety around the jetty area on the mainland. Mostly offering Dakgalbi. We prefer taking the path by the riverside while on the island though taking the path in between rows of ginkgo trees is great too.

Walk in the rain in Nami island Long journey from Seoul ,spend around 3hrs on the island with lunch in 1 of the restaurant. Didn't walk much but have a great time with my teens. Doing BBQ marshmallows in the DRIZZLE rain .
Landscape!

It's beautiful, there are some rabbits and squirrels running around. You'll need to take quick ferry trip to reach the island. Me and my wife went to the NAMI last September. We wished we could have visited mid October to see the full beauty of autumn surrounding the island. It was a good visit though it rained mid day. There are picture spots for the notable KDrama that filmed on the island ages ago. Lodging, restaurants and bike rentals are available for visitors.

Give it a miss if you don't have enough time We joined the Nami Island tour and it's quite a rushed experience for us. The island has lots of activities like biking, performance and little cafes for lounging and quiet time. Most likely you will need at least half a day to cover this place. The place is beaming with tourists at every corner so it's hard if you're looking to take photos without people. I enjoy the scenic ferry ride to the place the most.
Nice Scenery It was a small island with a lovely scenery. I noticed so many SEA visitors. I visited here at winter I heard the scenery will change in every season.

Luscious small island Lovely scenery, lots of facilities, beautiful overall. It is quite small though frankly, we spent 1.5h there and that was enough!Accessible easily by ferry, journey itself from the mainland only 5 minutesIf you’re there, I would definitely recommend trying the Hotteok at Sonata Cafe - it was warm and absolutely delicious! Of note though, it does contain pine nuts.

Nami Island It's like a fairy tale come true! It's this dreamy island with trees that change colors in different seasons. You can walk or rent a bike and feel like you're in a storybook. There's yummy food too, and the air is so fresh. If you're up for some magic and nature vibes, Nami Island is where it's at! 🌳🍂🚴‍♂️ You don't miss it if you blink If you are a follower with K-drama, then this place is familiar to you. I love the avenue of trees, it's picture perfect if you can get a time where no one is around but fat chance. Would you miss it if you don't have the time, NO. There is nothing here if you have been to other picturesque sites Its just there.. if its meant for you, you will find it It was in April of 2023. We were hoping to catch the last full show of the cherry blossoms. Alas, our amiable tour guide told us we were a bit late. However, lady luck was with us. At Nari republic there was a tree with cherry blossoms in its full glory. It was in a hidden part of the park. So lovely. Hope to back in the near future.
You need to spend a day here!

We took a 3 stops day tour which includes Nami island. And after visiting, we realized that 3 hours is really insufficient as although this is a small island, there is so much to do here and you could easily spend a full day here visiting libraries, eateries, museums, rides, cycling, visit k drama filming locations, etc. lots of photo opportunities. We will be back next time for a proper visit. Oh yea, as it gets cold during winter, there are several outdoor fire places where you can warm yourselves up. Really thoughtful!

Poetic & peaceful Beautiful place, clean, romantic, poetic and lovely.Many restaurants for different cuisines.1 day or half a day is enough so whenever you are next to this place, come enjoy the vibes !In springtime, I saw peacocks, squirrels and cute baby bunnies !Must be beautiful in autumn, because differents trees avenues and color palette.

Never again. Stick to the treasures of Korea to visit I was expecting a lot more from the tour to Nami Island. When you are travelling on holidays from another country you look for places that will leave you will a memory or something you don't see in your own country. Nami Island is nothing more than a big botanical garden. You walk around don't see much, eat a little walk some more and that's it. For us 30 minutes and we wanted to leave. The crowds on the ferry were terrible. Long wait, crowded in like sardines and uncomfortable. To be honest it's not a place for the travelling tourist it is only famous for locals because a famous Korean series was made there so everyone goes to take the picture near the statue. The cost of the tour was not worth it. 8 hours in the bus from Seoul, no drinks or lunch provided....really disappointing.
Avoid Tourist Traps in Korea, please!

Traveling all the way to Korea and going to Nami Island is like traveling all the way to Paris and going to a Ripley's Believe It or Not Museum. It's a tourist trap that was created for domestic tourists.I don't understand why it's so heavily promoted while actual Korean cultural spots are neglected.

Great tour experience with our guide Joe Park My family and I enjoyed our trip with guide Joe Park. We captured many beautiful sceneries along the way. Joe is very knowledgeable. He shared many tips and dining recommendations around Seoul with us. Overall, a great tour and would highly recommend this to visitors.

A great day visiting Nami Island We used K-1 Private Tour, through Viator, and had an excellent day; Nami Island, Rail Bike & Garden of Morning Calm. The garden was in bloom; Rail Bike must be experienced; and we could have spent all day on Nami Island.

Overhyped We joined a tour from Seoul to the Garden of morning calm, Nami island and Gimyujeong rail bike. Nami island was supposed to be the highlight of the tour but turned out the worst of the 3 places visited.  It is overhyped, with just average attractions and not really worth a visit unless you were a fan of “Winter Sonata”. There are not that many activities but lot of visitors. The gardens on Nami island pale in comparison to the beautiful Garden of morning calm.

Nami Island is Love Nami Island is a picturesque and tranquil escape from the hustle and bustle of city life, located about an hour's drive from Seoul, South Korea. As a traveler, I highly recommend a visit to this small half-moon-shaped island, which is known for its stunning natural beauty and cultural attractions.One of the main highlights of Nami Island is its beautiful tree-lined paths, which are perfect for leisurely strolls or bike rides. As you explore the island, you'll find plenty of peaceful spots to relax and enjoy the scenery, from tranquil streams and gardens to scenic viewpoints overlooking the Han River.In addition to its natural beauty, Nami Island also offers plenty of cultural attractions for visitors. The island is home to a number of art galleries and museums, showcasing the works of local artists and preserving the island's cultural heritage. You can also experience traditional Korean culture through various cultural performances and workshops, such as traditional Korean dance or calligraphy.One of the most popular attractions on Nami Island is the famous "Winter Sonata" filming location, which has become a pilgrimage site for fans of the popular Korean drama series. Visitors can take a stroll down the famous tree-lined path where the show's romantic scenes were filmed, and even snap a few photos at the iconic statue of the show's stars.Overall, Nami Island is a must-visit destination for any traveler seeking a peaceful and scenic escape from the city. Whether you're interested in nature, culture, or simply looking for a quiet place to relax, this charming island has something for everyone.I'm Planning to complete the 5 colors of Nami so far I have 2 3 more to go..

Nice place to relax, but very crowded While Nami is famous for Winter Sonata, as someone who has never watched the drama, it was still beautiful and enjoyable. It is not somewhere with a lot of activities, just nicely manicured gardens and paths to wander, as well as some cafes and restaurants (but expect queues during mealtime).During spring there were lots of flowers and tourists. Many, many domestic and foreign tourists, so the zipline into the island was fully booked and there was traffic leading into the area near the ferry.Ferry is very frequent so not much of a queue.A nice place to chill, but not somewhere I'd be in a rush to go back to as there are other natural sites to see.

A must visit for first tiners This was my second trip here. What made the experience a bit difficult was the uncooperative weather. It was a bit hot so walking under the sun made it difficult.The scenery was still exhilarating but the heat sapped my energy.
Nami island tour One of our best trip.wonderful trip coz of the help of our VERY GOOD beautiful  Guide . I recommend Sofia Kim if you want to have great time in your future tour of South Korea.

Don't understand the hyper behind this island I don't understand the hype behind this. Wasn't really impressed. First & Last for me. Maybe it will be nicer during snowy season Nothing special Very poorly maintained island. Tourist trap. Nothing to see. Long drive with traffic from/to Seoul. Not so sure why people are excited about this place. All photos with beautiful color and seasons seems just fake !

Beautiful Place to visit We did a day trip to Nami  Island. Middle of winter, it was cold, but worth it. i would love to see it in the spring when everything is blooming. Could spend hours wandering the island looking at whats there.There is also a zip line you can take to get onto the island which is a must do.

Breathtaking nature views that differ with each season This is one of those places you can visit multiple times in the year and still feel like there's something new to discover. The ferry ride is nice and comfortable, providing you with warm air in the cold winter months especially when it's freezing cold wind chills outside. Place has become somewhat of a tourist destination due to the hugely popular korean drama setting so there are shops ranging from convenience stores to souvenir shops and even restaurants and cafes.Do note that during winter, some pathways will be frozen over with ice so please wear proper footwear to prevent slipping. There are also a few fire pits where you can enjoy toasting some marshmellows which can be bought from stores nearby. Recommend to spend half a day here to soak in the scenery and take a leisurely walk around the island on foot.

Exciting 😊😄 I feel so much energized and exciting with the environment of the island. Efficient ferry and smooth journey. Self Guide walk,  trees, frozen lake, tiny animals like rabbit roaming around the place and facilities .

Beauty🍁 Famous place frequently visited by tourists from Seoul, nevertheless amazing atmosphere during autumn, rather felt like Korean dramas.Walked until the end of island & less crowd there for some photoshooting.
Beautiful in autumn The brilliant reds & gold leaves trees made Nami island so beautiful!!Made it a point to enjoy the colors & travel from  from 3rd week of Oct.

Very pretty but commercialised tourist spot Quite a fun place to visit. There are storage lockers for your luggage if you have them with you.Entire place is pretty and cute. You take the ferry or the zip line in, then walk around the island, many groves of different trees - each grove is a single species of trees (ginkgo, walnut, birch, maple) so you get spectacular photographs. Lots of couples there taking photos, lots of tourists too.There are lots of wild peacocks, squirrels and bunnies, and the river flowing around the island makes it more beautiful somehow.Food on the island is not much more than at mainland, and the food taste good.
Nami Island is in Gapyeong, not Chuncheon!!

If you take the train from Seoul to Chuncheon, you will not be close to Nami Island. It is actually near Gapyeong. We initially went to Chuncheon and only discovered afterwards that we should have gotten off at the Gapyeong station, which we passed through on the way to Chuncheon.I’m not sure why TripAdvisor lists Nami Island under Chuncheon, but it wasted an hour of our time.

half day recommended a half day there should be more than enough to walk around the whole island.there are many photo spots and gift shop.there also seem to be some pottery workshop if you're interested in that.has about 5+ eateries there so no lack of food option Fun and beautiful place This place was a very fun place to sightsee and to even eat some excellent food. You can get here two ways, the ferry boat or by huge zipline, which was what I did, and that was probably the best part about it, though the zipline was pretty scary. Once you get there, it's full of green and little small details like tiny bridges and sculptures. There's also many different options of food there, so hunger is not an issue. I went in the summer so it was very humid and hot but I would like to visit again in the spring or definitely in the winter when it snows. Overall, I would definitely say it's worth your time and should check it out.

Great place to visit in the Spring Nami Island is an island in the middle of the North Han River about an hour from Seoul by train or intercity train.  it has lots of nice trails and very nice views especially pretty in the fall and spring. You can stay on the island resort.  it has an old fashioned vibe.

Day out with friends It was a wonderful getaway from the hustle and bustle of Seoul. Mesmerising nature that any photo at any spot would look wonderful. We walked around and sat in different spots. Got some ice cream and snacks. There were some interesting looking sculptures too and saw few squirrels and rabbits and peacocks too. There are activities such as cycling and water sports. It is a nice place for couples, friends, families to spend the day. I would like to visit it in different seasons I bet it would be marvellous.

Good to do for day trip, however not necessary Interesting place to head to for a day trip out of Seoul city . Nice spots to take photos . Food was frankly , underwhelming. Had sausages / green tea restaurant / steamed red bean bun/ snowman pancake.Could finish walking round the island in 2 hours .
Scam Nami  blows big time. Overcrowded, not pretty, and the perfect example that marketing is more important than substance.

Enchanting island - Nami Nami is and independent island and It brings us to another world on this island. Beautiful in the fall, the vibrant colours from the well landscaped trees, plants flora and fauna. Beautiful in any angles makes beautiful picture postcards.Many came here for the  Kdrama setting which we have no clue or knew about until we saw a worn out poster that many were taking photos with/of.We're just happy to be strolling this island for a day and enjoying snacks and local food, cafes. Good place to (must) visit with friends or with family.Direct bus from Myeongdong or longer route by train. Then short ferry trip.

Overnight stay Arrived about 8pm. The island appears shut down and very quiet. Hotel van shuttle picked Imus up at the ferry terminal and appeared to know of our arrival. We may be the only people in the hotel and although we did manage to catch last call for a drink it looks like bed time here is 9PM. No sign of the crowds so talked about online, at least so far....

Beautiful in Autumn While the island has some pretty scenery, it is almost always packed to the point where it’s impossible to enjoy it. Have patience as there will be multitudes of individuals and groups posing for that perfect Instagram. So if going for scenery and photography I’d recommend a different place. I do think they’ve done a great job with the infrastructure to help mitigate the crowds. Strolling the island for casual leisure and family time is great, they have a lot there for children. I’d recommend grabbing food on the island. The Hotteok (sweet Korean pancake) is delicious. Zip-lining in is our favorite way to enter. Visiting the nearby Garden of Morning Calm, Petite France, and/or Gangchon Rail Cars would round the day out nicely. I love the sign they added for the Tulip Tree that fell during typhoon Lingling, very comical.

A Very Popular Tourist Attraction Near Seoul We went on our own to Nami Island from our hotel in Myeongdong.There are different ways of going to Nami Island. One is to join a bus tour that departs early at Pagoda Park in the morning (8 am) and returns at 1 pm or to Do It Yourself (DIY).Here is a simple guide to go there:1. From Myeong-dong Station, take LINE 4 train heading to the direction of Chungmuro Station to get to Dongdaemun History & Culture Park Station.(Train ticket one way is Won 2,550)2. When arriving at Dongdaemun History & Culture Park Station, change to LINE 2 and take the train heading towards Sindang Station to get to Wangsimni Station.3.When arriving at Wangsimni Station, change to JUNGANG LINE and take the train heading towards Cheong-nyangni to get to Mangu Station.4.When arriving at Mangu Station, change to KYEONGCHUN LINE and take the train heading towards Galmae Station to get to Gapyeong Station, which is our destination.This train journey from Myeongdong to Gapyeong will cost you KRW2550 (Cash) one way.It is one of the most visited places in South Korea because of a Korean Drama shot in the island I love Nami for its beautiful trees with autumn yellow leaves.

Before and after I came to the island, I had re-watched the series "Winter Sonata". For that, Nami island had never disappointed my expectation. Very peaceful, very beautiful! Pure fresh air from this island will stay in my mind for long.

For nature and k-drama lovers Though quite a ride from Seoul, it is a must out-of-town trip.Hire a van with driver to make the commute comfortable. Drop by Petit France first since it is on the way.Gets too crowded especially around lunch time. Better eat lunch back at the coast and not here in the island.Love the trees and the view of the lake. Lots of photo opportunities.

Nami adventure When visiting south Korea you should consider Nami island on your bucket list. The place is wonderful especially who likes nature. There's also a lot of activities in the island. Walking around the island is very relaxing and breathtaking , if your hungry they also have good restaurants around. And also the have rooms if u want to stay there for over night or for how many days.
Must go place if you really love nature!

I was here a few years back for the autumn season which the fallen leaves were really beautiful and nice! So this time round I decided to drop by Nami Island during Spring and I really loved Nami even during Spring!Once you have landed at Nami Island from the ferry, you can really feel the spring showers and wind blowing across your face. You can just practically spend the bulk of your time enjoying a slow walk along the tall trees, or to look out for famous sights where Winter Sonata was filmed. But one of the things I like to do over at Nami is to actually head over to the central area where there is a Well like structure. They do sell Red Bean buns which was really tasty, so I recommend heading over to the center area and see if the buns captures your stomach!You can also rent bikes to cycle around Nami so that could also be another option when you are here. A thing to note is that you might need to take note of the ferry arrival and departure hours as during peak seasons where there are a lot of tourist, it might be challenging for you to get on your ferry. So if you are a time sensitive traveler you might want to factor this in!

Autumn is the best time to visit Visited Nami Island during autumn, the autumn foliage is amazing. There are several paths that lead to different trees being planted on the island. scrap any planned path you may have, just go with the flow. Cater more time for the visit to Nami island and do take note of sunset time. the island is boring after sunset.

서울에서 꼭 가봐야 할 곳 남이섬은 제가 추천하는 매우 아름다운 곳입니다. 이곳에서 키 큰 나무 아래를 걸어가거나 강변을 따라 산책하여 고요함을 즐길 수 있습니다. 사랑스러운 눈사람의 존재와 벽난로의 설정은 섬에 따뜻함을 더합니다. 눈이 내리는 추운 겨울에 특히 좋습니다. 섬에는 공작새와 토끼 같은 야생 생물도 있습니다.아름다운 자연 외에도 작은 기차, 노래 박물관, 자전거, 장식, 상점 및 레스토랑 등 섬에 시설이 있습니다. 나는 꿀 겨자 소스로 나미 소시지를 맛 보았습니다. 가격은 3, 000 원이며 시도해 볼 가치가 있다고 생각합니다.지하철, 택시 및 페리를 타면 도심에서 섬에 도착하는 데 2 시간이 걸리지 만 여전히 장소를 추천합니다. 또한 가을과 같은 다른 계절에 아름다운 경치를 즐기기 위해 다시 오는 데 관심이 있습니다.
최근순가장 최근의 게시 날짜를 기준으로 내림차순으로 정렬된 리뷰.상세 리뷰:대기 시간, 방문 기간, 일반 팁, 위치 정보 등 사용자가 선택한 항목에 따라 정렬된 리뷰.

This Place always make me missed it its for your honeymoon or your prewed fotography or have a quality time with your family. They have so many scenery and facility, rent bike , electric bike, train ,  water sport on summer like flying fish, banana boat and other 많은 사람들이 있지만 시설은 압도되지 않았습니다 우리는 Klook을 통해 예약 한 하루 투어의 두 번째 다리로 이것을 방문했습니다.남이섬을 방문한 사람들의 수는 전반적인 경험에서 약간 혼란 스러웠습니다. 그러나 인프라가 너무 까다로워지지 않도록 충분히 개발되었음을 인정합니다. 화장실은 섬 전체에서 쉽게 구할 수있었습니다.나는 페리의 격렬한 내부를 좋아했다. 냉동 조건을 감안할 때 많은 환영을받습니다.완벽한 겨울 연가 사진을 촬영하지 않으려면 추천합니다!
평화로운 로맨틱 아일랜드 여기서 적어도 2 시간을 소비하는 것이 가장 좋습니다. 부두에서 중앙까지 걸어가는 것을 즐길 수 있습니다. 스노우 존, 높은 트리 존, 리버 사이드 가든 등이 있습니다.이 섬은 계절마다 아름다운 전망을 가져야합니다.
펀 아일랜드 볼거리와 볼거리가 많고 카페가 많은 재미있는 섬입니다. 작은 조각상, 얼음 조각, 얼음 조각에서 썰매를 내리는 눈 언덕이있었습니다. 도처에 화장실! ! 나를위한 주요 사건은 강변 보도이었다. 끝까지 아주 조용히!

좋은 소풍 남이섬은 서울에서 3 시간 거리에 있으며 단체 투어에 참가했습니다. 일반적으로 단체 여행은 아침 진정의 정원에서 길을 따라 또 다른 매력으로 표시됩니다. 둘 다 좋은 매력이었습니다. 부두에 도착하면 남이섬으로가는 페리가 짧고 주파수가 좋습니다. 우리는 춥고 바람이 부는 날에 갔고 상황이 좋았을 때 여전히 방문을 즐겼습니다. 우리는 겨울 연가 (2002 한국 드라마)의 팬이었고 영화 촬영지의 위치를 알려주는 랜드 마크가있었습니다. 나무가 늘어선대로는 정말 좋았고 고요하고 자연적인 효과가 있습니다! 눈이 아직 나쁘다. . . 또는 그것은 꽤 장면 일 수 있습니다 :) 아름답지만 포장! 너무 많은 사람들.
1 초 동안 빈 사진을 찍을 것이라고 생각하지 마십시오. 일년 내내 특히 모든 잎 색깔을 가진 가을에도 그래도 가치가 있습니다.

Super super cute This is a fun trip to do, especially with friends. If you do not feel like doing a tour to visit the island it is super easy to get to with public transportation. The island itself is very beautiful with lots of nature and well maintained grounds. The staff is nice and the food as mouthwatering. Honestly wish I could have spent more time here and is a must visit again.

Nice getaway form Seoul Place where korean soap opera winter sonata was filmed.It would be prettier during snow season.Crowds of tourists from all over the world come to the pilgrimage of korean soap opera location.

Not much of a scenery if there is no snow Nami island is best visited if there is there is some colours of the leaves can be seen like spring, autumn but dont go during early winter (we went on 18 Dec) and all the leaves dropped, the colour is mostly brown. Thus there is not much too see in terms of nature and the island is quite small with just some structure or statue that reminded us of Winter Sonata.
최근순가장 최근의 게시 날짜를 기준으로 내림차순으로 정렬된 리뷰.상세 리뷰:대기 시간, 방문 기간, 일반 팁, 위치 정보 등 사용자가 선택한 항목에 따라 정렬된 리뷰.
남이섬 방문하기에 매혹적이고 목가적이며 재미있는 곳. 시골 분위기에서 고대 한국을 한 눈에 들어보고 멋진 현지 식사를 즐기십시오.

남이섬 한국인들은이 장소가 한국 드라마 겨울 연가에 등장하기 때문에 특별하다는 것을 알고 있습니다. 나는 실제로 여행하기 전에 드라마를 보았다. 아름다운 나무 선 도로가있는 독특하고 경치 좋은 지역입니다. 우리는 가을에 방문하여 주변 단풍에서 변화하는 색상을 즐길 수 있었기 때문에 매우 아름답습니다. 많은 사진 조작 영역이 있습니다. 하이킹이나 자전거 타기 많은 트레일. 어린 아이들을위한 재미있는 놀이기구. 즐길 수있는 상점과 레스토랑. 이 지역에는 1455 년에서 1468 년 사이에 통치했던 조선 왕조 세조의 통치 기간 동안 반란군에 대항하여 큰 승리를 거둔 나미 장군의 무덤이이 지역에 있다는 것을 아는 사람은 많지 않습니다. 남이섬에 도착하고 시간을 보내려면 하루의 좋은 시간이 걸릴 것입니다. 당일 치기 여행을 위해이 지역을 포함하는 여행 그룹에 가입하는 것이 가장 좋습니다.
아름다운!
방문 할 가치가있는 매혹적인 자연. 도시에서 기차로 1 시간 이상 소요됩니다. 공원을 따라 산책하는 것은 놀랍습니다.

Winter Sonata The Place Where Love Begins 🥰 Nami Island was the highlight of the day. Originally we were a little bit apprehensive about visiting since Nami Island is extremely famous for being the filming location of the popular K-Drama, Winter Sonata. Regular readers will probably know that I’m not the biggest fan of busy attractions in Korea!This is place where love was found and made famous in the movie “Winter Sonata” series that made Korea such a wonderful place to visit around the world.

Fantastic place Oh this place is fantastic, the trees so gorgeous and the air is so fresh. It's just a short boat ride on to the island, where you enjoy the scenery and its beauty. Also food and entertainment is available for kids and adults.
Romantic winter time at Nami island .
My second time been to Nami Island after 7 years . I missed this place . Not to be missed out , a must visit !

Scenic and Romantic A scenic island in the middle of a river. About an hour's ride from Seoul, followed by a short ferry, or "fly" across if you want a bit of thrill. It was a cold day and the ice carvings were pulling in the crowd. I can imagine that the best season seeing this place would be deep autumn - we shall be back, one day.

Nami Island What a magical place this is. It is winter when I was there but the snow has yet to fall. I could only imagine how beautiful and romantic it would be when its all white. So much to explore. Beautiful walks almost at every corner.The perfectly in line tree lanes is breathtaking, making any photos taken turned out perfect! Definitely a place to visit in South Korea.

Short review on Nami Island We liked this visit to Nami island very much. It took a 15 min ferry ride to the site. There are regular scheded trips. The ice sculptures are very nice. A photoshoot at the Winter Sonata film location is a must do.

MAGICAL LIKE A STORYBOOK IN FALL We went there right at its best moment. The yellow ginko leaves and red maple leaves turned into magical flowers. It feels like you went inside a story book. The weather is cold but pleasant and bearable. Nami Island is a place for all seasons. We already experienced the green trees during last summer. We will surely go back at spring to catch the cherry blossoms.
최근순가장 최근의 게시 날짜를 기준으로 내림차순으로 정렬된 리뷰.상세 리뷰:대기 시간, 방문 기간, 일반 팁, 위치 정보 등 사용자가 선택한 항목에 따라 정렬된 리뷰.
아름다운 작은 섬 섬에서 3 시간 만 보냈고 섬의 많은 곳에서 사진을 찍을 수있었습니다. 보트는 많은 관광객을 데려 왔지만 많은 사람들이 단지 두 시간 동안 거기에있었습니다. 시도 할 많은 말렛 식당이있었습니다. 시간이 허락한다면 반나절을 쉽게 보낼 수 있습니다. 섬에는 타조, 토끼 공작도있었습니다.

나쁘지 않은 것도 특별하지 않습니다 페리 또는 비행 여우를 사용하여 섬에가는 방법은 2 가지가 있습니다. 겨울이되자 후자를 선택합니다. 섬에 도착하는 데 약 5 분이 걸렸습니다.섬에는 영화 "Winter Sonata"의 장면에서 나무 사이에서 눈에 띄는 사진을 찍을 수있는 곳이 많이 있습니다. 불행하게도 나무를 덮고있는 눈도없고 잎도 없었습니다. . . . 나뭇 가지와 나뭇 가지만 사용할 수 있으므로 영화에서 장면을 재현하려는 경우 눈이 내리는 지 확인하십시오.길을 따라 핫도그, 아이스크림 등을 판매하는 공급 업체가 있습니다. . . 오히려 비싸지 만 그들은 섬에서만 먹을 수있는 음식입니다.전반적으로 한국에 있다면 가자.하지만 두 번 할 것이 아닙니다.
Beautiful, peaceful.. depends..

It was a beautiful place, instagram worth photos, when youre the only one there. The downside was that when its packed, everyone wanna get the worthit pic and you tend to get someone's head or hand or whatever in your photo. It is still a serene, breathtaking place when no one is around to mess up your pic tho. I saw a dog owner let his dog pee on a tree lol that kinda dampened my spirit to lay on the grass and take a pic. At the end of the day, its a wonderful place.. worth a visit.
겨울철 겨울 썰매 타기 긴장을 풀고, 여기에서 시간을 보낸 후, 우리는 3 p에서 아침 진정의 정원 버스를 타러 갔다. 조명 축제를 놓치지 않도록 m.

아름다운 개인 섬 네이티브 모란 잉꼬와 인기있는 데이트 장소로 알려진 월요일 아침에 처음 도착했을 때 혼잡하지 않았습니다. 겨울인데도 여전히 가을의 색을 볼 수 있습니다. 이른 아침이었던 것에 따라, 그것은 안개가 컸다. 그리고이 경치가 좋은 섬은 섭씨 0도에 가까운 고요한 고요함과 아름다움을 가지고있다.식당과 기념품 가게가 몇 군데 있지만 그렇지 않으면 아름다운 자연이 있습니다. 강 한가운데에있는 섬의 가장자리를 따라 걷는 것도 매우 진정합니다. 방문할만한 가치가 있습니다.
재미있는 곳 일부 동물, 풍경 및 음식이있는 재미있는 곳. 사진을 찍을 좋은 곳이 없어서 사진을 찍지 않으면 모든 것을 빨리 끝낼 수 있기 때문에 할 일이 많지 않습니다. 군중이 사라질 때까지 기다려야합니다. 한국 원화를 나미 통화로 환전 할 수있는 '은행'도 있습니다.

초겨울에는 볼거리가 없습니다 다른 계절에 있거나 눈으로 덮인 경우 방문이 훨씬 좋습니다.12 월 중순에 방문했는데 실제로 볼 것이 많지 않습니다. 기계로 만든 약간의 눈으로 비참한 작은 경사가 있습니다. 방문객들은 눈 위에서 사진을 찍고 있습니다.화재 장소 (나무로 태워)는 방문객들이 따뜻하게 지낼 수 있도록 여러 곳에 설치되어 있습니다.섬 주변에서 자전거를 타는 것이 좋습니다. 키가 큰 나무를 순환하는 것이 좋습니다. 섬이 크지 않기 때문에 30 분 동안 4000 원이 소요되었다. 렌탈 센터가 페리 터미널 근처에 있으면 더 좋습니다.편안한 장소.

??? ???? ?? ?????. ????? ? ???? ??? ???? ? ??? ????? ?? ??? ? ? ?????. ???? ??? ????, ???? ???? ???? ?? ???? ?? ??? ?? ????.많은 매력이있는 것이 좋았습니다. 여행 가이드는 좋았고 나는 남이섬을 좋아합니다. 외국인 관광객이 방문한 이유를 알 수 있습니다. 나는 여름에 두 번만 방문하고 겨울에는 또 다른 주제가 있다고 들었습니다. 다시 방문하고 싶습니다.

반짝이는 전부가 금은 아닙니다 남이섬은 사계절의 장소로 묘사됩니다. 눈 덮힌 겨울, 벚꽃 봄, 녹색 여름, 빨간색 노란색 떨어지는 단풍 풍경. 그러나 12 월 초가 춥지 만 눈이 내리지 않는 12 월 초에는 모든 것을 볼 수없는 경우가 있습니다. 솜 브레장소 : 서울에서 코치로 약 90 분. 일단 거기에 도착하면 (스탠드 룸) 페리를 타고 섬으로가는 티켓을 구입하십시오. 다리가 파이프 라인에 있습니다 (가장 시위). 다른 쪽 부두에서 작은 섬 주위를 걷거나 (약 1 시간) 자전거를 빌릴 수 있습니다 (가족 용으로 탠덤을 이용할 수 있음), 미니 기차 (단거리 전용), 버기 기차 (20 분 정도) 한국어로만 이야기하는 섬).타조 펜, 기계로 만든 스노우 힐, 카페가있는 악기 박물관, 푸드 센터 (할랄 레스토랑 및 무슬림을위한 기도실 포함)가 있습니다.12 월 이전에 눈이 오는 것을 피하여 남이섬을 최대한 활용하십시오.
최근순가장 최근의 게시 날짜를 기준으로 내림차순으로 정렬된 리뷰.상세 리뷰:대기 시간, 방문 기간, 일반 팁, 위치 정보 등 사용자가 선택한 항목에 따라 정렬된 리뷰.

숨막히는 고요한 섬 KKday에서 페리 터미널까지 예약 한 서울에서 코치를 타고 나미 섬으로가는 페리를 탔습니다. 페리는 지정된 시간에 도착했으며 약 5 분 정도 탑승 할 때 아무런 문제가 없었습니다.남이섬은 우뚝 솟은 나무의 흔적에서 멋진 경치를 감상 할 수있어 놀랍습니다. 한국 드라마 윈터 소나타에서 명성을 얻었으므로 촬영에 관심이 있다면이 섬으로 향하십시오.우리는 코치로 돌아 가야하기 전에 약 2 시간을 걸어 다녔지 만 섬의 절반 정도만 커버 할 수있었습니다. 가능하다면 더 오랫동안 거기에 머무르는 것이 좋으며, 여러 가지 식사 옵션이 있으므로 식사를 위해 정착하십시오. 여행하는 동안이 섬에 오셔서 환상적인 전망에 매료되는 것이 좋습니다!
나미 나라 공화국 멋진 경치가 보이는 아름다운 섬. 깨끗하고 평화로운 곳. 많은 활동을 할 수 있습니다 (하늘 자전거 등).

아름 다운 사람이 만든 섬 풍경은 숨을들이 마시고, 각 각도는 완벽한 사진입니다. 인기있는 K- 드라마가 겨울 풍경에 인기를 끌게 된 것은 놀라운 일이 아닙니다. 각 계절마다 다른 장면이 제공되며 색상은 매력적입니다.도보 또는 자전거로 쉽게 갈 수 있고 많은 식당과 카페에서 휴식을 취하거나 간식, culpa를 먹거나 가족이나 친구와 식사를 할 수 있습니다.가족과 애완 동물 친화적 인 섬. 최근에 독립을 달성 한 흥미로운 역사는 자체 통화로 1000 거주지의 마이크로 국가가되었습니다.방문하십시오. 명동과 인사동에서 직행 버스로 2 시간이 소요됩니다. 보트 타기 10 분 및 모험적인 지퍼 라인으로 9 분 만에! !
여기를 방문 할 가치가있는 보기는 훌륭했다. 가이드는 우리에게 올바르게 설명했습니다. 과정은 쉬웠다. 우리 시대에 많은 사람들이 노력하지 않았기 때문일 수 있습니다. 전반적으로 재미 있고 놀라운 경험이었습니다. 물론 남이섬은 숨이 views 을듯합니다.

Beautiful place with many corners for good photos You can reach the island via a ferry or in style through an A line zip! There were many good corners and opportunities for photo shoot. Kids will enjoy a mini train ride across the island for 5000 won and there is also a bus tour available if interested (7000won). There is accommodation on the island, a picture library and playgrounds. We enjoyed taking photos at a mock up wine tavern and a toilet (near the bike rental) which is designed to be strike by a meteorite.It was a shame that we went with a tour and had only 1h30min (including the ferry rides to and fro). We could easily have spent half a day there relaxing at the island.
남이섬 요즘 실제로이 장소를 여행하는 것이 가장 좋은시기는 아닙니다. . . 운 좋게도 우리는 여전히 일부 단풍이 떨어지는 것을 볼 수 있으며 실제로 바람이 불고 있습니다. 냉정한! ?

Superb view! worth visiting very accurate waiting time for ferry, large space can stay indoor or outdoor. In Nami visitor able to rent strollers for 3000won for whole day which gives us much convenient. Very attraction and scenery were breath taking. It is very clean and comfortable to walk although there are many visitors. There's a muslim halal restaurant available with tasty menu's, they even have musollah and it is connected to picture library with indoor playground for kids while parent taking bites.Its a must go place when visiting SEOUL!
대부분 좋은, 빨리 가십시오!

한국에서의 놀라운 경험, 아마도 내가 가장 좋아하는 것. 불행히도 지금은 상점들로 가득 차 있지만 여전히 훌륭합니다. 남편은 약 10 년 전에는 사업으로 오염되지 않았으며 더 이상 저렴한 기념품과 음식 / 음료를 즐길 수 있다고 말했습니다. 나는 음식이 이민 지역 바깥의 레스토랑 가격의 두 배이기 때문에 나미를 먹는 것을 귀찮게하지 않을 것입니다.우리는 약 3 시간을 보냈습니다. 가장 중요한 부분은 첫 시간에 섬 주변에서 자전거를 타는 것이 었습니다. 우리는 보트의 첫 번째 사람들이자 자전거를 빌린 첫 번째 사람이었고 수백 명의 사람들없이 사진을 찍고 경험하는 것이 놀랍습니다. 우리는 12시에 떠났고 사람들로 가득 차 있었고 도로가 막혔습니다. 멋진 사진을 찍거나 자전거를 자유롭게 탈 수있었습니다.자전거는 품질이 좋지 않았습니다. 1 시간 동안 8, 000, 나쁘지는 않지만 자전거 좌석 중 하나가 고장 나서 직원이 변경하지 않으면 실망했습니다. 그들은 늙고 녹슬었다.
나미의 아름답고 매혹적인 전망 좋은 방문과 나는 다시 가고 싶어서 하루 종일 즐길 수있는보기를 원합니다. 그것은 단지 혼잡하지만 이것은 시간을 보낸 것에 대해 매우 매혹적인 장소입니다.
한국 소나무의 아름다운 차선 한국의 텔레 노벨 라에서 볼 수있는 아름다운 한국 소나무를 즐기십시오. 한국 텔레 소설을 좋아하지 않는다면 아침 고요 수목원을 추천합니다.
최근순가장 최근의 게시 날짜를 기준으로 내림차순으로 정렬된 리뷰.상세 리뷰:대기 시간, 방문 기간, 일반 팁, 위치 정보 등 사용자가 선택한 항목에 따라 정렬된 리뷰.
자연을 품다 유명한 나미를 기념하는 멋진 작은 섬. 섬에서 자연과 다른 요소를 완전히 즐기려면 하루를 보내십시오.

절대적으로 매혹적인 나는 최근 몇 년간 매년 네임 아일랜드를 방문합니다. 보통 10 월 말입니다. / 11 월 초. 올해 서울의 여름은 매우 길었고 비가 거의 없었으므로 서울 숲을 포함한 도시 지역의 은행 나무는 노랗게 변하지 않았습니다. 제가 남이섬을 발견했을 때 여전히 10 월 말에 노란 은행 나무가있었습니다. (보통 은행잎이 떨어졌을 것입니다.) 나는 10 일 동안 3 번 가면서 단풍의 색이 변하는 것을 보았습니다. 다행히도 다람쥐와 붉은 다람쥐에 대한 좋은 사진을 얻었습니다. 나는 수줍음이 많았 기 때문에 과거에 나미에서 다람쥐를 보지 못했습니다.
아름다운 섬!
월요일에 갔는데 여전히 혼잡합니다. 가을 분위기는 시원하고 상쾌한 공기와 화려한 단풍으로 아주 좋습니다. 서울 중심에서 지하철로가는 것은 3 번 노선을 갈아 타야하기 때문에 번거롭고 혼란 스러울 수 있습니다. 셔틀 버스로 가기가 더 쉬울 것입니다.서울에 하루가 더 있다면 방문하기 좋은 곳.
winter sonata if you are fans of korean drama winter sonata, then this is the place you shouldnt miss...   nami island still remain nature and good for a day trip..
Superb scenery Must visit place for tourist who visit Korea for the first time.  Romantic Korean drama Winter Sonata made this place famous.
남이섬 남이섬은 한국 드라마 촬영 장소 중 하나이며, 남이섬에서는 파트너 또는 가족과 함께 여행하기에 적합하며 겨울에는 방문하기에 적합합니다.
So beautiful!!!

I went with a tour bus in October, and it was so nice to see the color leaves and Fall season here!!! The different colors of the leaves really light up Nami Island :). I would highly recommend to come here in the Fall--October to early November. At Nami Island, you can eat and buy souvenirs. There are some snack shops, as well as restaurants on the island. You can also rent a bike for 8,000 won for 1 hour. I did the bike rental, and it was great to ride the bike around Nami Island. You can also see many different statues, and the famous Korea drama statue---Winter Sonata. Many fans from around the world come to Nami Island to see the Winter Sonata statue. It's smaller in person, but it's nice to see if you are a fan of the drama. Overall, Nami Island is such a gorgeous set it with tall trees on the sides of the path. I love it, and sure would visit again in the future :).

Lovely but very touristy Nami island is a must visit place when you’re in Seoul, at least once. Having said that, Nami is so packed with tourists even on weekdays. We went strolling and love seeing the autumn colors.
Don't  Miss To Visit A fun place to visit for families and solo traveler. A lot of beautiful views. Prepare  your cameras for the wonderful  moments.

쁘띠 프랑스, 남이섬, 간촌 레일 바이크-대한민국 나는 지난 10 월 한국 남이섬에있었습니다. 나는 아주 좋은 곳이었습니다. 전략적인 사진 촬영 장소와 나는 그들이 자신의 사진을 되돌아 보았을 때 그곳에 온 사람들이 매우 확신합니다. 가을 시즌이었고 잎은 화려합니다. 내가 전에 느끼고 싶어 지금은 지금 순간에 sometihing. 거기에 도착하기 위해, 나는 klook에서 패키지를 샀다. 패키지에는 왕복 운송, Petite France, Nami Island 및 Gangchon Rail Bike의 입장료가 포함되어 있습니다. 여기서 사진을 공유하겠습니다. 저렴한 가격입니다. 패키지 가격은 RM 235에 불과합니다. . . . .
최근순가장 최근의 게시 날짜를 기준으로 내림차순으로 정렬된 리뷰.상세 리뷰:대기 시간, 방문 기간, 일반 팁, 위치 정보 등 사용자가 선택한 항목에 따라 정렬된 리뷰.
한국 최고의 단풍 남이섬 또는 남이섬은 서울 수도 외곽의 아름다운 단풍으로 유명한 관광지 중 하나입니다. 페리를 타거나 우편선을 통해 나미 섬으로가는 재미있는 방법을 선택해야합니다. 섬을 여행하는 것은 도보로 편안한 신발을 착용하십시오. 그림 같은 휴양지이므로 많은 관광객들이 사진을 찍을 것을 기대하십시오.
남이섬 아름다운 가을 경치-가을 연가 드라마 겨울 연가 이후로 항상 남이섬에서 아름다운 경치를보고 싶었습니다. 실제로, 화려한 나무가있는 매우 아름다운 가을 경치입니다. 사진 촬영하기 좋은 곳.호텔에서 현지 투어를 예약했습니다. 지역 투어는 호텔에서 당신을 선택하거나 돌아올 것입니다.
놀랄 만한 많은 놀라운 화려한 단풍으로 남이섬에서 돌아 왔습니다. 나미에서 가을의 절정이라고 생각합니까 ??
모든 연령대에 탁월합니다!
서울의 혼잡에서 온 것을 환영합니다! 유쾌한 산책로, 쾌적한 전망. 시각적으로 관심이 많은 항목. 가을의 색채가 나타나기 시작하여 나무는 다양한 색으로 채워졌습니다. 페리는 본토에서 당신을 데려가 몇 분 밖에 걸리지 않습니다. 이 섬에 호텔이 있지만 1 ~ 2 박 이상 숙박하는 것을 상상할 수 없습니다. 낮이나 오후를 보내는 가장 좋은 방법입니다.

과대 광고-1/2 남이섬에 대한 많은 리뷰가 있었기 때문에 정말 궁금했습니다. 약속이 취소되어 매우 일찍 나미에 가기로 결정했기 때문에 다른 사람들이 밀링하지 않고 사진을 찍을 수있었습니다. 섬 / 페리 / 입구 게이트는 오전 8시 전에 열립니다. 입장료에는 왕복 보트 타기가 포함됩니다. 가평역에서 출발하는 트랜스 포는 버스 나 택시를 통해 갈 수 있습니다. 택시 요금은 약 5000 원이므로 특히 3 명과 함께 여행하는 경우이 거래는 나쁘지 않습니다.내 인상은 그것이 괜찮다는 것입니다. 어쩌면 과대 광고는 약 절반으로 줄어들어야합니다. 이것은 인스 타 그램 게임을 보장하는 사람이 만든 / 상업 정원 / 섬이기 때문에. 이 장소를 방문하는 가장 좋은 이유는 서울에서 교통이 매우 쉽고 저렴한 기차 요금이며 자세한 계획없이 섬을 쉽게 탐색 할 수 있기 때문입니다.
가을의 사랑 이야기 활동이 많은 아름다운 풍경. 다양한 색상과 완벽한 날씨로 가을에 가기에 가장 좋습니다. 봄과 겨울은 맨손으로 나무와 얼음 땅을 남기고 여름은 모든 푸른 나무와 너무 뜨겁습니다. 더 많은 옵션을 위해 페리를 타기 전에 외부 상점에서 식사하는 것이 좋습니다. 단 5 분만에 페리를 타십시오.
가을 사랑에 빠지는 매우 낭만적이며 장소의 분위기와 에너지를 느낍니다.이 섬은 영웅적인 장군의 이름을 따서 명명되었습니다. 하루 종일 걸어 다니면서 멋진 카페에서 휴식을 취할 수 있습니다.
예쁜 나무와 잘 지어진 곳이지만 관광객으로 가득합니다.
남이섬은 단풍을 볼 수있는 좋은 장소이며 기차 + 페리를 통해 쉽게 갈 수 있습니다. 그러나 관광객으로 가득 차 있으며 모든 소음 속에서 자연을 실제로 즐기기가 어렵습니다. 작은 상점과 식당도 있지만 서울에서 볼 수있는 일반적인 가격보다 더 비쌉니다.

가족과 함께 서울에서 남이섬 자체 방문 남이섬은 참으로 아름다운 곳입니다. 우리는 이번 10 월에 그곳에 갔으며 가을, 나무에 붉은 색 잎이 꽂 히기 시작했고 놀라운 경치입니다. 우리의 작은 아이들은 달리고 놀면서 정말 좋은 시간을 보냈습니다. 그러나 두 가지 주요 단점이 있습니다. 하나는 서울과 거리가 멀다는 것입니다. 우리는 짧은 택시와 짧은 페리보다 가평까지 2 개의 기차를 따라 독립적으로 도착했습니다. 한 방향으로 2 시간 이상 걸렸습니다. 또 다른 옵션은 단순히 서울에서 여행하는 것이지만 훨씬 더 비쌉니다. 두 번째 문제는 장소가 매우 혼잡하다는 것입니다. 관광객과 방문객으로 가득합니다. 따라서 유럽 / 북아메리카에 거주하고 가을에 나무의 붉은 색을 보는 것이 평범하거나 붐비는 장소를 싫어하는 경우 나미를 쉽게 건너 뛸 수 있으며 다른 흥미로운 장소에서 하루를 보낼 수 있습니다 한국에서.
아름다운 섬이지만 touristy 남이섬은 매우 예쁘지 만 관광지입니다. 우리는 단풍을 보려고 거기에 있었고 많은 싸움과 토끼가 돌아 다니는 것을 보게되어 기뻤습니다. 혼자서 가면 매우 혼란 스럽기 때문에 일일 투어에 참여하는 것이 좋습니다. 식당 음식은 좋지 않으며 혼잡합니다. 자신의 음식을 포장하고 정원에서 소풍을하는 것이 좋습니다!
최근순가장 최근의 게시 날짜를 기준으로 내림차순으로 정렬된 리뷰.상세 리뷰:대기 시간, 방문 기간, 일반 팁, 위치 정보 등 사용자가 선택한 항목에 따라 정렬된 리뷰.
좋은 곳 우리는 너무 많은 방문자를 피하기 위해 아침 일찍 여기를 방문합니다. 우리는 여기서 평화 롭고 조용한 곳을 즐길 수 있습니다. 나무가 아름답습니다. 우리는 걷기와 자전거 타기로 긴장을 풀었습니다.
남이섬의 Rendevous 남이섬은 꼭보아야 할 곳입니다. 섬 주변의 자전거와 같은 것들을 탐험하고 재미있는 것들이 많이 있습니다. 가을과 봄 시즌에는 다시 돌아가는 것이 마음에 들지 않습니다.

Good place to stop by It was good place to hang around with friendsSo many beautiful trees Are there and good photo spots tooWell maintained and clean! Recommend to visit early in the morning there are so many ppl 가족에게 딱 일주일 동안 꽤 좋은 곳. 주말에 확실하지 않습니다. 아이들을위한 많은 활동. 화창한 날에 좋은 곳.

남이섬 우리는이 섬을 방문하기 위해 서울에서 당일 치기 여행을했습니다.서울의 용산역에서 1 시간이 채 걸리지 않은 게이 평까지 ITX 열차를 탔습니다. 피크가 아닌 시간대에도 티켓이 빨리 팔리는 것처럼 보임에 따라 계획을 세울 가치가 있습니다.Gaypeong 역에서 우리 중의 3 명이 있었던 것에 따라 우리는 택시를 움켜 쥐었다 그것은 버스보다 빠르고 쌌다. zip 라인 (가족 코스) zip 라인 (어드벤처 코스 또는 페리)으로가는 두 가지 옵션이 있습니다. zip 라인 어드벤처 코스는 가파른 달리기이지만 다른 섬으로 이동하면 나미 섬으로가는 페리를 이용할 수 있습니다. zip 라인 가족 코스는 더 느리고 인기가 높으며, 2 시간의 대기 시간이 있었으므로 우리는 약 5 분 또는 10 분이 걸리는 페리를 탔습니다.이 섬은 산책하기에 아름답고 다양한 풍경, 호수 전망, 정원, 숲, 동상, 폭포 및 분수, 상점, 예술 및 공예품, 바, 레스토랑 및 문화적 장소를 즐길 수 있습니다.우리는 가을에 거기에 있었기 때문에 멋진 색상 중 일부를 보았습니다. 이것은 서울에서 당일 치기 여행으로, ITX에서 쉽게 관리 할 수 있으며 대도시의 번잡함에서 벗어나는 멋진 휴식이었습니다. 시골과이 놀라운 공원의 일부를 반드시보아야합니다.
남이섬 섬 자체는 매우 멋졌다! 나무와 자연으로 둘러싸여 있습니다 (많은 방문객 제외). 우리는 자전거를 타고 많은 사진을 찍었습니다. 공기는 좋았고 통로는 자전거와 자동차가 여행하기에 충분히 넓었습니다.

멋진 매력 대단한 매력입니다. 우리는 호수를 건너기 위해 보트로 가야합니다. 섬은 아름답고 평화로운 공원이며 문화적으로 멋진 거리로 개발되었습니다. 조용하고 조용한 장소입니다. 한국에서 봐야한다 한국의 행복한 곳 나는이 장소에 두 번 있었지만 그것을 극복 할 수 없습니다. 이곳에는 평화로운 느낌이 드는 것이 있습니다. 잎이어야합니다. . . . 계절에 따라 변화합니다.

Nothing much actually, it just nice to take a break from the city as we went to Seoul. Everywhere is scenic so everyone pretty much took pictures at every corner with the beautiful flowers blooming. 죄악이지만 ... 투어 녀석 가야 할 아름다운 곳, 비가오고 있어도가는 곳, 페리는 5 분 정도 소요됩니다.
최근순가장 최근의 게시 날짜를 기준으로 내림차순으로 정렬된 리뷰.상세 리뷰:대기 시간, 방문 기간, 일반 팁, 위치 정보 등 사용자가 선택한 항목에 따라 정렬된 리뷰.
가을의 아름다운 나는 이곳을 영원히 돌아 다닐 수 있었다. 가을은 당신 주위에 따뜻한 색의 단풍이있는 완벽한 계절입니다.
평화 롭지 만 외치는 것은 없습니다 우리가 초여름에 방문했기 때문에 Perhapa는 봄이나 가을처럼 예쁘지 않았습니다. 그것은 일반적으로 평화 롭고 편안했지만 특별히 소리를지를 가치가 없었습니다. 한 번이면 충분합니다.
리빙 윈터 소나타 교통편과 가이드를 제공하는 서울 시티 투어와 함께 일일 투어를 예약했습니다. 반나절 산책과 섬 탐험에 보냈다.
매우 편안하고 편안한 우리 팀과 나는 행복한 아침을 보냈습니다. 사진 촬영을위한 많은 장면. 우리는 자전거를 빌렸다. 10 월에이 섬을 방문하여 노란 잎을 보는 것이 좋습니다.서울에서 시도해야합니다.

매우 평화 롭고 편안한 장소 하루 여행으로 4 시간 동안 갔다. 그것은 충분히 길지 않았다. 하루 종일 보낼 수 있다면. 그들이 제공하는 좋은 점은 섬 주위를 순항하기 위해 세그웨이 유형의 물건을 임대 할 수 있다는 것입니다. 그들은 놀랍고 너무 재미있었습니다. 이 경험의 유일한 단점은 휴가로 인해 많은 사람들이 있다는 것입니다 서울에서 당일 치기 좋은 곳 나미 섬은 서울 시내 외곽으로의 하루 여행을 찾고 있다면 쇼핑 시내에서 휴식을 취하기에 좋은 선택입니다. 비록 우리가 최고의 타이밍 (이슬비가 내리고 여름과 가을 사이)에 방문하지 않았지만 우리는 여전히 섬 주위를 산책하는 것을 즐겼습니다. 유아가 견인을하면서 (읽기 : 느린 속도), 우리는 스윙 카페에서 시간을 보내는 것을 포함하여 3 시간 안에 abt에서 도보로 섬을 덮을 수있었습니다 (방파제에서 도보 3 분). 커피와 샌드위치를 즐기기에 좋은 아늑한 장소. 놀랍게도이 카페의 가격은 매우 합리적입니다. 나는 봄이나 가을과 같은 성수기에는 섬이 훨씬 더 아름답다고 생각하지만 비수기에도 여전히 아름답습니다. 군중이 오후에 최고조에 달하는 것처럼 아침에 방문 할 것을 제안하십시오.
관광하기 가장 좋은 곳 장소는 아름답고 깨끗했습니다. 친구와 가족과 함께 가기에 좋은 곳이었습니다. 할랄 식당도 많았습니다.
남이섬 한국의 유명한 Telenovela의 "겨울 연가"촬영지입니다. 우리는 페리로 10 분 미만 만 여행한다고 생각합니다. 섬은 그렇게 크지 않으므로 2 ~ 3 시간 안에 덮을 수 있습니다. 잘 보호되고 유지 관리되는 지역입니다. 우리는 온통 사진을 찍는 것을 즐겼습니다. 우리는 여름에 왔으며 혼잡합니다. 놓치지 마세요!
아름다운 우리가 나미를 방문했을 때 비가오고있었습니다. 아직도 방문은 아름다웠다. 장마철에 방문 할 때는 방수 처리가되어 있으면 비옷과 운동화를 준비하십시오.
매우 관광지이지만 방문할만한 가치가 있습니다.
이 장소는 사람들로 가득했지만 여전히 방문할만한 가치가 있습니다. 섬은 매우 작고 반나절이면 섬 전체를 탐험하기에 충분합니다. 섬에는 많은 (가장 비싼) 포장 마차가 있지만 사진을 찍고 싶다면 좋은 위치입니다.페리가 섬으로가는 대신 우편 노선을 이용할 수있는 옵션도 있지만 방문 할 때 너무 추웠습니다.

그럼에도 불구하고 방문할만한 가치가있는 매우 Touristy Name Island를 방문해야 할 이유는 두 가지가 있습니다. 하나는 당신이 Winter Sonata 팬이 아니라고 들었고, 두 개는 하드 코어 Winter Sonata 팬이라는 것입니다. . .윈터 쏘나타가 세계 무대에서 한류 드라마를 불러 일으키는 "한류"를 담당 한 이래로 Name Island는 관광에 의해 변화되었습니다. 섬은 꽤 작지만 이곳 사람들을 매료시키는 것은 수많은 사진 촬영 기회가있는 아름다운 풍경입니다.섬에 들어가기 전에, 2006 년에 Name Island가 자치국으로 선포 된 후 Name Island가 실제로 미시 화 국가임을 알 수 있습니다. 그것은 심지어 자체 통화를 가지고 있지만 한국 원화는 널리 받아 들여지고 있습니다.

나는 겨울 소나타 때문에 거기에 있었다 이 섬에서 당일 치기 여행을 예약했는데 드라마 겨울 연가를 상기시키는 길을 여행했습니다. 투어 가이드는 Kdrama 때문에 많은 관광객들이 그 장소를 방문한다고 말했다. 섬일뿐입니다.일년 중 어느 계절 에나 아름답습니다. 우리는 모두 녹색 일 때 왔습니다. 많은 영화와 드라마가 여기에서 촬영 되었기 때문에 사람들이 저를 포함하여 그 자리를 보게되었습니다. 내 아들은 이곳 저곳을 돌아 다니는 동물들을 좋아했습니다. . . . 다람쥐, 공작, 모든 종류의 새, 관광객의 핸드폰을 한 번 이상 먹었 기 때문에 동봉 된 타조.나는 눈사람이 그 지역 주위에 전시되는 방식을 좋아했으며 전 세계의 언어로 섬을 생각하는 간판에있었습니다. 여기서 한두 시간을 보낼 수 있습니다. 따뜻했기 때문에 우리는 식당에 잠시 머물면서 피자, 파스타, 닭고기를 먹었습니다. 맛 있었지만 꽤 비쌌습니다.드라마 이외에도 동물들도 옛날에 한국인의 삶의 방식을 배우게됩니다. 그것이 바로 엔터테인먼트, 문화 및 환경입니다.한국에있는 동안 꼭보아야 할 곳.

봄의 남이섬 남이섬은 자연의 아름다움과 고요함을 선보입니다. 섬이 기억에 남는 장면을 촬영 한 곳이기 때문에 K-Drama Winter Sonata의 팬들에게 인기가 있지만, (나 같은) 단 한 번의 에피소드도 본 적이없는 사람들을위한 방문의 가치가 있습니다!남이 섬을 처음 방문했을 때는 가장 더운 여름날이었습니다. 그래서 대부분의 잎이 말라 버렸고 황량했습니다. 그럼에도 불구하고, 공원은 아직도 당신의주의와 감사를 사로 잡을 수있는 위엄과 우아함의 공기를 뿜어 냈다.다행히도, 지난 봄에 내가 그 풍경을 방문했을 때 그 풍경은 활기가되었습니다. 겨울의 추위는 아직 사라지지 않았기 때문에, 공원 주변 산책을 편안하게 해주는 에어컨이 설치된 실내 정원 (싱가포르의 정원 전시와 유사)에서 방금 산책 한 것처럼 느껴졌습니다.잘만되면 나는 다음 번에 가을과 겨울에 섬을 방문 할 수있을 것입니다!

Nami Island, South Korea If you love the Winter Sonata, then you should consider this place a part of your South Korea travel list. The island is about 2 hrs away from the city center. The little "town" has their own currency called Naminara thus you have to exchange your Korean won upon arrival. In totality, the place is soo picturesque esp the lined up trees where during my visit, we saw around 3 couples having their prenup shoots. It is very much ideal to go during winter time where the ground would be totally snnow white. You would definitely need a day to go around the island. A day tour would also include few hours at Petite France. A real quaint place with lots of beautiful sceneries.
최근순가장 최근의 게시 날짜를 기준으로 내림차순으로 정렬된 리뷰.상세 리뷰:대기 시간, 방문 기간, 일반 팁, 위치 정보 등 사용자가 선택한 항목에 따라 정렬된 리뷰.
정말로 즐거운 시간을 보냈다.
나미 공원 정말 좋은 곳. . 많은 사진을 찍을 수 있습니다. . 당신을 따뜻하게하기 위해 커피를 마셔야합니다. . 그것을 사랑하니?
좋은 장소 방문하기 좋은 곳. 여름철에는 매우 뜨거워지는 경향이 있으므로 권장하지 마십시오. 아직도 매우 멋진 장소. 사진을 찍을 곳이 많습니다. NAMI와 같은 인스 타 그램입니다. 밴드 연주가있었습니다. 그리고 배가 고프면 휴식과 카페가 근처에 있습니다.
아름다운 섬 나는이 섬을 아주 좋아한다. 아름다운 나무, 풍경이 있습니다. 누구나 겨울 연가의 팬이고 배 용준은 한 번이 장소를 방문해야합니다.
즐거운 하루 PLIKO PLIKO와의 춘천 여행. 특히 남이섬에서의 경험은 매우 즐겁고 멋진 자연의 아름다움을 목격했습니다. 아주 좋은 PLIKO 여행. 이 멋진 여행을 위해 Gina 씨와 Toni 씨에게 감사드립니다.

도시에서 멀리 떨어진 섬 남이섬과 작은 프랑스로 데려다주는 여행의 한 부분으로 갔다. 도시에서 차로 길다. 당신이 자연을 보는 것을 즐긴다면, 당신은 긴장을 풀고 걸어 다닐 시간이 있습니다. 이것은 당신을위한 장소입니다. 여기 주변에서 쇼핑 할게별로 없습니다. 카페와 레스토랑을 이용할 수 있습니다. 이곳은 한국 연극 - 겨울 연가로 유명합니다. 투어 가이드가 질문하면 겨울 연가를 보았습니까? 드라마는 약 20 년 전의 일입니다. 그 드라마를 본다면, 당신의 나이를 추측 할 수 있습니다.
아름다운 나무 비가 올 때이 장소는 약간 진흙이 될 수 있습니다. 많은 키가 큰 나무들과 동물들이있었습니다. 공작과 토끼도 많이있었습니다. 여기에서 할 일이별로 없으며 그냥 돌아 다니며 사진을 찍을 수 있습니다. 놀이터가 있습니다.

와우. Crapola 우리 투어 패키지의 일부였던 서 락산 국립 공원을 여행 한 후 다른 두 가족과 함께 그곳에갔습니다. 얼마나 시간 낭비입니까? 자신을 약간의 악화와 돈을 절약하고이 장소를 건너 뜁니다. 그것은 당신의 돈과 정신으로부터 당신을 분리하기 위해 창조 된 사람이 만든 섬입니다. 끔찍하고 값 비싼 음식을 먹지 않고 값 비싼 장신구를 사면 높은 가격에 구입할 수밖에 없습니다. 피곤한 타조와 토끼의 펜과 실제로 박물관이 아닌 노래 박물관이 있습니다. 당신은 페리를 타고 페리가 당신의 관광 버스로 돌아갈 때까지 기다리는 것을 제외하고는 아무 것도 할 수없는이 작은 혼잡 한 섬을 걸어 다닌다. 나는 투어 회사가 섬에 사람들을 채우기 위해 돈을 잘 지불 받았다고 내 집에 걸었습니다. 우리가 보았던 누구나는 당황하고 잃어버린 것처럼 보였던 외국인이었다. 이 장소를 건너 뜁니다. 나 한테 고마워 할거야, 약속 해.
서울에서 시간 초과 서울을 몇 시간 동안 즐기기에 좋은이 섬은 의미가 있지만 관광지이며 다른 곳은 거의 없습니다. 군중들로부터 멀리 걸어 가면 조용해진다. 돈을 위해 그것의 꽤 가치가 있었던 KKDay 여행의 일부로서 갔다.

자전거 렌탈 다른 평론가들이 말했듯이, 남이섬은 매우 관광객입니다. 그러나 대부분의 사람들은 섬 중간에 주 노선을 유지합니다. 나는 자전거를 빌 렸고, lovely 한 시간을 섬의 가장자리 주위에 더 풍경의 그리고 평화로운 길을 탐험하도록했다. 당신이 앉아서 숙고 할 수있는 그늘진 곳에는 많은 좌석이 있습니다. 자전거 대여는 페리가 떨어지는 지점에서 주 나무가 늘어선 길을 따라 600 미터 왼쪽에 있습니다.

관광을위한 장소 이곳은 긴장을 풀고 긴장을 풀 수있는 큰 공원과 같으며, 자전거 타기와 수상 스포츠를 제외하고는 여기에서 할 일이별로 없습니다. 불필요한 4 시간을 보내려면 2 시간이면 충분하다고 생각합니다. 많은 레스토랑도없고, 기념품은 너무 비싸서 구입할 수 없습니다. 걷는 길은 모래와 진흙으로 가득합니다. 우리가 특히 아이들을 위해 걷는 것에 지쳤을 때 경로를 따라 더 많은 벤치와 쓰레기통을 놓아야합니다. 우리 아이는 다리가 아프다고 불평했습니다. 너무 많은 방문자가 같은 길을 걷고 있기 때문에 자전거가 너무 비싸고 자전거가 부드러워지지 않기 때문에 자전거 대여는 문제가되지 않습니다. 우리는 걷는 동안 위험 할 수있는 많은 급행 자전거를주의해야합니다. 적절한 자전거 도로는 관광객을위한 환경을 개선하기 위해 만들어 지도록 권장됩니다.
최근순가장 최근의 게시 날짜를 기준으로 내림차순으로 정렬된 리뷰.상세 리뷰:대기 시간, 방문 기간, 일반 팁, 위치 정보 등 사용자가 선택한 항목에 따라 정렬된 리뷰.

Tranquil and Scenic Unfortunately, it rained when I arrived at the island else I would have given it 5*. Nevertheless, Nami Island is still one of the most scenic places I have ever visited. The filming location for the famous Winter Sonata does not disappoint. The gardens are well maintained and it was also a joy to see all the wild animals (squirrels, rabbits) in a large natural environment, compared to some of the other gardens in Korea when they are cooped up in small cages :(We had hoped to zipline down to the island but the weather did not allow for it. Worth the entrance fee!
과대 평가 된 우리는 섬에 여행 버스를 가져 갔다. 그리고 여행 시간은 각 방법으로 약 2 시간이었다. 사진을 찍을 수있는 명소가있었습니다. 그것 이외에, 섬은 지루하다. 그러나, 우리 방문 날에, 그것은 많은 관광객으로 북적였다. 나는 그 섬을 방문하는 것만으로도 여행할만한 가치가 없다고 느꼈다.

Beautiful Nami island in summer may not be as beautiful as in other season, but still worth to see. We were planning to spend just an hour there before heading to garden of morning calm, but ended up spending 3 hours and didn’t have time to go anywhere else as we went with a bus shuttle that left at 4.30.nami island is a very serene and beautiful place. there are some small museums or exhibitions there. we particularly liked the one that showed beautiful paintings of andersen fairytales.we found many people bringing their dogs there and we had fun looking at them. there were also a big peacock and a few ostriches.i could only imagine how beautiful this small island in spring or autumn. will definitely visit it again in other seasons if we could.
경치 좋은 산책 남이 섬에 들어가는 가장 좋은 방법은 Zipline을 경유하는 것입니다. 보기는 훌륭하고 타는 것 자체는 빠르지 만 편안하다.남이섬에서는 볼거리가 많습니다. 나는 당신의 참고를 위해 아래 섬지도를 포함시켰다.

Peaceful, Romantic and Memorable island a 평화롭고, 낭만적이며 인상적인 장소입니다.년간 1500 만 명의 관광객이 방문합니다.무슬림들이 기도할수 있는 작은 기도방, 무솔라, MUSOLA 가 마련되 있습니다.Peaceful, Romantic and Memorable island and famous Korean drama - "Winter Sonata" shooting place. over 15 million tourists visit in a year.

노부모 방문 (휠체어) 나는 Paul Chang의 한국 휠체어 투어를 찾았고, 노인 부모를 서울에 4 일간의 짧은 휴가를 보내려고 계획했다. 82 세인 아버지는 멀거나 빠르게 걸을 수없는 이동 문제가 있습니다.장 씨는 휠체어를 돌보는 일에 관해서 자신의 경험과 헌신을 보여주었습니다. 그는 우리 의견으로는 매우 전문적이었습니다.장씨와 그의 동료 인 데이비드 (David)와 함께, 부모님은 나미 섬의 아름다운 봄 날씨와 명소를 즐길 수있었습니다. 이동성 문제가있는 누군가에게 실행 가능하지 않았던 어떤 것.장씨 (한국 휠체어 여행)에 큰 감사를드립니다!
장소는 ok 다. 그러나 관광객으로 넘쳤다.
조용한 곳을 찾을 수 없으므로 섬의 멋진 사진을 찍을 수는 없습니다. 우리가 아침 일찍 거기에 도착할 때에도 관광객들로 넘쳐났다.
남이섬의 봄 봄 시즌의 남이섬은 사쿠라 애호가들에게 꼭 필요한 곳입니다. 섬은 아름답고 핑크색 꽃으로 덮여 있으며 봄바람은 정말 책을위한 것입니다!
반드시 방문해야합니다.

단체 관광을하는 경우, nami island - ganchon railway - morning calm combo의 정원을 즐기는 것이 가장 좋습니다. 그래서 peti 프랑스는 건너 뛰고 nami를 즐길 시간이 더 있습니다. Klook은 가장 저렴한 투어 제공 업체이며 잘 조직되었습니다. 시간을 최대화하기 위해, 나미까지 5 분 페리에서 내리신 후 유니세프 열차를 타고 nami 섬 끝까지 가신 후 다시 부두로 돌아가십시오. 메타 세쿼이아 나무 경로 근처에 이탈리아 레스토랑과 아시아 레스토랑이 있습니다. 페리 터미널에서 유명한 dak galbi를 먹을 수도 있습니다. 당신이 포케몬을 가면, 섬에는 미친듯한 찌름과 찌르다 정지가 있습니다.

관광 나는 약 11am에 보통의 것보다 나중에 조금 갔다, tad는 혼잡했다. 그러나 아직도 그렇게 나쁘지 않았다. 내 친구가 약 2 시간 일찍 와서 그녀는 그것이 비어 있다고 말했다. 연락선 표 가격은 ok이었다, 줄의 abit를 얻었다. 그러나 너무나 wasnt 한. 나는 너무나 멀리 wasnt 한 가평 역에서 택시에 탔다. 그러나 나는 버스가있다라고 들었다. 내 친구는 또한 관광 패키지 일일 패스를 구입하여 모든 nearbg 관광 명소에 버스 승차권을 포함시킬 수 있다고 말하면서 그냥 관광 카운터로 향합니다. 슬프게도, 나는 그것을 시험해 보지 않았다.그들이 나의 수화물을 유지할 수 있었을 정도로 표찰 계산대 뒤에 그들은 화장실 근처에서 사물함을 가지고 있었다. 그들에게는 zipline 활동이 있습니다. 이것은 당신이 섬에 들어가기위한 방법입니다. 페리를 타기보다는 정말로 흥미로 웠습니다. 페리는 상대적으로 빈번하므로 그렇게 나쁘지 않습니다.섬은 아름다웠다. 정말 놀라운 일이었습니다. 너무 예쁘고 고요했습니다. 비록 페리 부두에서 군중이 있었지만, 일단 insidez는 모두 사진을 찍기 위해 센터로 몰려들 것이다. 그래서 옆 길 중의 1 개까지 걸어 라. 그러면 그것은 그렇게 나쁜 cox ppl가 긴 산보를 원하지 않는 경향이있다. 그것은이 섬의 유일한 목적이다. 풍경은 훌륭했다. 돈의 가치가 있습니다. 여기에 점심을 먹기를 원한다면 레스토랑이 꽤 있습니다. 섬에 머물고 싶다면 숙박 옵션이 있다고 생각합니다. 당신이 참여하기를 원한다면 약간의 수상 활동이 있습니다.

평화 롭고 좋은 장소 12 월 중순과 5 월 초에 두 번 방문했습니다. 남이섬까지 페리를 타고 가야하며 페리 섬은 항구를 10 ~ 20 분 간격으로 출발합니다. 장소는 정말로 평화로 웠고 걷고, 아름다운 풍경을 즐기고, 간단한 식사 / 음료를 즐길 수있는 좋은 장소입니다. 아이들을 놀 수있는 놀이터가 있습니다. 섬을 여행하기 위해 도보로 걸어가거나 자전거를 빌려주거나 기차를 탈 수 있습니다. 섬 주변에 여러 개의 레스토랑과 카페가 있으며 음식 가격은 서울의 다른 레스토랑과 같습니다. 정말 멋진 핫떡을 판매하는 곳이있어서 체크 아웃하고 사용해보십시오! 나는 그것이 1이라고 생각한다. 5 - 2 시간은 섬을 탐험하기에 충분합니다. 소풍이 있거나 정말로 긴 산책을 떠나기 만하면 않는 한.5 월에 갔을 때 꽃이 피고 나무가 정말 아름답습니다. 반면에 12 월에는 너무 추웠을 때 많은 나무들이 불모의 땅이었습니다.

가을에 가족과 함께 갔다. 처음으로 한국에 발을 들여 놓고 가을을 경험 한 것은 처음이었습니다. 장소는 정말로 정말로 아름다웠고 불가사의했다. 그것은 색으로 붕괴 된 그림과 같았고 온도는 정말로 차갑습니다. 열대 지방에서 왔지만 우리는 날씨를 절대적으로 좋아했습니다! 우리는 섬에가는 연락선 보트를 가져 갔다. 그러나 섬으로가는 길을 계획하는 옵션도 있습니다. 그 곳은 걷기 좋은 흔적입니다. 왜냐하면 모든 구석이 훌륭하기 때문입니다! 동물들은 자유롭게 장소를 돌아 다닙니다. 우리도 우리가 발견했지만 특이하지만 귀여운 공작 나무를 발견했습니다. 은행 나무, 세쿼이아, 그리고 일본 단풍 나무 차선은 숨이 막힐뿐입니다. 당신이 워커 타입이 아니거나 걷는 것에별로 신경 쓰지 않는다면 거기에 앉아서보기를 들으면 다른 최상의 옵션이 될 것입니다. 배고프거나 갈증을 느끼는 일은 결코 카페와 레스토랑으로 가득차 있기 때문에 결코 문제가되지 않습니다. 장갑과 따뜻한을 파는 가게도 있습니다. 절대로 장소를 사랑하고 언제나 컴백하는 것을 좋아합니다!

Nami Island visit during March (Spring Festival period) Nami Island is a must visit place if you are visiting Korea. I would venture to say that even if you are just touring Icheon or Seoul. A trip to Gangwon to visit Nami Island is worth it. We visited for only a couple of hours (whole afternoon) so it is not a full experience I'm sharing here.SOME NOTES:We visited as a family and as part of a tour group we were definitely milling around a few hundred people on the island. We visited during spring, it is the best time in my opinion.LIKE!1). Take in the scenery - The main focus of Nami Island is how well the place is maintained. I like the beautiful landscaping or how the different trees, grass, and flowers are blended to give you a serene and picture/instragrammable place. We even chanced upon a group who were almost finished doing a nuptial photoshoot.2). Ferry-trip - I liked how the ferry had a regular transit to-and-from the island. You didn't really have to wait very long to get on a ferry. Plus, the trip was pleasant as you get to see different places within the vicinity before landing on the island. It was also very clean and you really didn't have any worry during the short trip.3). Lots of shops and restaurants -  They had different shops offering souvenir items of all kinds/types/sizes, some like the more modern t-shirts, trinkets, toys. And the more traditional ones like hand-carved / wood-crafted items. You won't get hungry here as there are several shops where you can get food from finger foods to full restaurants.CAN BE  IMPROVED1). Tourism / Promotion - I liked the novelty of Nami Island having its own 'government' and currency but didn't really get to experience what the goal of having this was. It was just a curious aspect of the visit for me. Maybe have something more geared towards tourist who just visits the island once and for a few hours only.2). Long ferry trip - I'm not sure if it was intentional, but I felt the ferry was traveling really slow. I didn't believe such a short trip would take more than 30mins (actual travel time only) to get to the island.3). Lack of personnel - I noticed during our visit that not all the shops were open, and there were hardly any person whom tourists can approach if they had questions or concerns. I just saw the maintenance people (like gardeners and attendants) pruning the grass and cleaning the fields. It would help if they had a couple of people dedicated to helping tourists with any questions or help they needed.CONCLUSION:People have different preferences. Some people like the festive atmosphere of crowds in a place like Nami Island, some would prefer a more serene moment in this place. Definitely visit during spring, it is the best time in my opinion, but be prepared for the tourist crowd during spring. It's their busiest season.

Not just for Winter Sonata fans I booked a tour to Nami Island + Garden of Morning Calm on Klook. During the tour, I learned that Nami Island was named after General Nami who died at the age of 26 and was buried on the island. It took around 1 hour plus by bus from Seoul to Nami. Once you reach the jetty, you can choose either to take a ferry or zipline (at additional charge) to the island. Attractions on the island include General Nami tomb, Elysian waterfall, Winter Sonata filming location, Winter Sonata statue, and Winter Sonata first kiss. I rented a bike and managed to cover the entire island in less than an hour. For Muslim travellers, there's a halal restaurant on the island (Asian Cuisine Restaurant). The restaurant menu includes halal Korean dishes such as bulgogi and dakgalbi.

A fitting tribute to a great warrior A must place of visit in Seoul and if you’re a nature lover, never miss it. One of the main tourist attractions in Seoul ,this place boosts of large foot falls in all seasons. The island has a entirely different look during each season making it very popular among the tourists and also the local population. During spring one can see the trees blooming with flowers and many visit this place to enjoy the snow draped trees in winter.Named over General Nami who was known for his courage and died at an young age of 26, this island has a swimming pool, a large open grass field in the middle, water boats, water skiing, roller skating ring, a hotel /resort and a many cafes and restaurants. There is also a bicycle rental service ,which is very popular used by many to go around this island which is covers a circumference of around 5 kms.This island can be reached thru a ferry or thru a zip line. But to return back to the main land, one needs to opt for ferry only.This place is around 65 kms from the Seoul and based on the time you can spare, the visit can be around 4-5 hours to full day.One can also reach this place very early morning and then club the visit other attraction nearby. The best option would be to opt for a room at the Island  hotel or resort and enjoy the stay.If you are a small family of 3-4, then hire a taxi and if you are a group of 7-8 members, then hiring a Jumbo taxi would be the best option. For individuals and on visiting on limited budget ,there are Shuttle bus services from Insadong, Mandaemun and Myeongdong or one can take a train and get down at Gapyeong Station which is around 2 kms away from Nami Island.

Very cold and nice scenery Recommended for half day trip to this beautiful place.Entry and ferry ticket for adult costs 13,000 won and 10,000 won for youths.Lots of Muslim friendly restaurants and rest place to chill and relax.Cheers Only 60+ kms from Seoul, and worth a visit My partner and I were lucky to visit Namiseom (or more commonly Nami) Island at the beginning of November, right in the middle of the Autumn fall period. As a result we not only got to experience the island itself, but the brilliant autumnal colours of the leaves on the trees, from brilliant red, to bright orange and outstanding yellows.The island is actually in the middle of a lake, but has no bridges to it, even though only about 200 metres from the surrounds of the lake. All travel to the island is via one, of a number of, boats that provide the traverse experience.There is much to see on this narrow, and longish island. Plenty of accommodation facilities, restaurants, food outlets etc., although eating on the island can be somewhat expensive. There are plenty of easy walks around the island, with so many beautiful views. It is a VERY easy walk because the entire island is almost totally flat, with no hills or mountains. A reasonably casual walk around the entire island can take you between 1 - 1.5 hours, but by its very nature and design, you can cut short your walk at almost anytime, and return back to the boat port via another easy path. Well worth a visit.And if you have the option, try to do it in Autumn fall time (end of October and first two weeks of November) when you will have the added bonus of the beautiful colours adding to the impressive views that the island has to offer.

Romantic and peaceful My family and I spent an enjoyable 3 hours on a hot weekday afternoon at Nami (Namiseon) Island, which was formed as a result of the construction of Cheongpyeong Dam and was named after General Nami.Getting there:We took a taxi from the main road next to Gapyeong Rail Park and reached the ferry terminal with a taxi fare of ₩5300. We took a bus back to Myeong-dong that left (daily) the ferry terminal at 5pm, which contradicts the 4pm departure time stated in the brochure. The bus is behind the ticket booth and it reached Myeong-dong at around 6:30pm. Besides the Myeong-dong bus, there are direct shuttle bus to and fro Nami Island ferry terminal from Insa-dong (9:30am), Namdaemun (9:30am), Myeong-dong (9:45am). You have to check the departure time from Nami Island Ferry Terminal bus park with the ticket counter.Depending on the time of the day, the ferry departs every 20 to 30 minutes. The “visa fee” (entrance fee) is ₩13,000 for adults (₩10,000 entry fee and ₩3,000 ferry fare), ₩10,000 for students (13-17 years old) and seniors and ₩7,000 for children. However, we paid ₩10,000 each because the ferry fare was free from January to June 2018. Besides the ferry, you could opt to take the zipwire one way into Nami Island (₩38,000, includes entry fee and return ferry fare)The attraction:The “Naminara Republic” brochure mentions “Today Nami Island is a place for rest and relaxation. Human beings, animals and trees share peace, love and harmony far away from crowds and civilisation.” I agree that the “crowds and civilisation” refers to Seoul and mainland Korean peninsula. But every time the ferry berths, crowds of tourists swarmed the island, hence it is never far away from crowds! You have to be patient and wait for the crowd to walk on and disperse before you could have that private moments and fantastic photos with the rows of trees at the Central Korean Pine Tree Lane, Cherry Tree Lane, Gingko Tree Lane and Metasequoia Lane. The trees are so tall that these could reach the sky but more importantly, they offer cooling shade from the sun. At the Metasequoia Lane, don’t miss the brown statues of the two lead actors of the Korean hit drama Winter Sonata (which was shot here) - Yong-joon Bae and Ji-wo Choi, and a bench with the picture of these two Korean actors as the backdrop.Besides the above Tree Lanes, we enjoyed the Nature walk at other parts of the Nami Island. When the weather became unbearably hot, we took refuge at the Book Café and ate bingsu. You could rent bicycles if you don’t want to walk.My next visit to Nami Island would be during the autumn or where I will stay the night in the bungalows (₩160,000 – 380,000) or cottages (₩119,000-149,000) where we can experience the “rest and relaxation” the next morning and “far away from crowds”.Overall, Nami Island amazed me in that it is well maintained since its opening in 1965. Don’t miss his attraction when you are in Seoul…even though you are not a fan of the romantic Korean drama!

Namisum is a tiny half-moon shaped island located in Chuncheon, South Korea, formed as it was inundated by the rising water of the North Han River as the result of the construction of Cheongpyeong Dam (청평댐) in 1944. Its name originated from General Nami (남이장군), who died at the age of 28 after being falsely accused of treason during the reign of King Sejo, the seventh king of the Joseon Dynasty of Korea. Although his grave was not discovered, there were a pile of stones where his body was supposed to be buried. It was believed that if someone took even one stone from there, it would bring misfortune to their house. A tour company arranged the grave with soil and then developed Namisum into an amusement park.I visited Nami Island with a friend and we took a ferry across to it - although a Zip Line is optional for a higher fee.Nami Island has restaurants with very good Korean food: BBQ and hot pot style...There is a Jittney to drive you around for a small fee so you can see the  perimeter of the Island.There is a small Ostrich farm.There are even guest houses available to rent.It's a very nice day trip and worth going to. Must visit Make sure you visit this place at least once.It is a mini secluded island in the middle of Korean Peninsula.I suggest you book a tour service online before your visit (e.g. Klook). To avoid crowds, visit at the earliest time (9 AM-ish) as you still need to take a boat there. We took the path contrary to the suggested pathway so we were able to take in the scenery without crowds at all.The middle of the island is the most crowded especially the Winter Sonata photo spots.You don't need a long time to circle the island, only around 2 hours, or 3 if you want to visit the museums as well.

WINTER SONATA Most famous Korean movie ,  Winter Sonata was filmed here.Its a must to visit for winter sonata fans. The island exectly same as you watching the drama..and Just get ready your camera because Nami is peaceful island with its breathtaking view.

UNICEF family Friendly Island Nami island is a must visit for all holiday makers in Seoul. It is the island of Korean Film making industry. You will be transported to the main island through 10 minutes Ferryboatride.   The island itself is small but beautiful. The main walking way is lined with Pine trees. It is usually sunny, so make sure you have your hat and sunglasses with a bottle of water. Our tour guide recommended a traditional lunch at Nammoon (Authentic Korean restaurant). We had a great, healthy and tasty lunch.   I am not very sure about the name of the dishes, see photos for illustration. You can stay at the island for a few days in one of the hotels for rest and relaxation.SEE photos.

Zipline to Nami Island with secret photo spots It costs ₩38000 per person, including the zipline, private boat to Nami Island and way back ferry. I expected taking Zipline to the main island of Nami. In fact, you have to take a boat transfer to the Nami Island. They have two courses: 30-40km/ for family and 80km/ for adventure.**reservation is not required if you visit Nami Island during summer. The waiting time is short too:)There are many secret photo spots here and I think it is even prettier than the main Nami Island.We have waited for 10 mins for the short boat trip, which takes around 8 minutes. There are only 10 ppl in the boat and luxury compared to the ferry, which can carry 100+ people.

Not worth in Summer I don’t know. I just thought it’s too much a hassle to travel to Nami in summer. Not that I’ve been during other seasons. But Nami in summer is not ideal. Firstly, the weather is a killer. Super hot. Secondly, there wasn’t much to see. The cafes here and there were nice but not easy to find tables as many people would like to find shelter to hide away from the sun too. Thirdly, too crowded. There were not just tourists but also Koreans.One can choose to either take the ferry or zip line to get to Nami Island when you reached the ferry terminal. The ferry is just a 5min ride.We got onto a coach for a one day tour to Petite France and then Nami Island. Fyi, the coach ride for the last 15 min to Petite France made some feeling nauseous as the road was quite winding. Quite certain even if the tour were to go Nami Island first, would be the same.

Short day tour to Nami island Taking coach to ferry terminal for a 5 min transfer to the island was easy. The island look small but walking from one end to the other takes about 45 mins. Took a non-stop tour train cost ys 7000 KW was a good choice so at least we know where are the places we need to explore later. It will be nicer to go in winter to take the stretch of trees where the Korean tv series Winter Sonata was filmed.A trip worth going!

Best Place to Get Away from the City Learn from our mistake: Don't forget to tap out your Seoul T-money card from Yongsan station when you are about to transfer to an ITX train going to Gapyeong.You can purchase your ticket from the station (if you want a reserved seat) or you may also buy your tickets on-board if you don't mind standing. The conductors during our trip were kind enough and knew basic English so it was not much of a trouble for us.Spend your entire day to Nami Island for a picnic. There's no corkage fee if you bring your own meals, although food sold inside the resort were not too expensive as well. You may opt to skip Petit France. :)Instead of paying for an unlimited bus ride for a day, just ride a local bus to Nami and back. We paid for an unli bus ride and we had a not so pleasing experience with it. The bus from Nami to Petit France was full so we had to stand during the entire ride (it felt like almost an hour ride to the next destination). We got dizzy, thus we did not enjoy Petit France as much as we have to.
Flying Zipline to Nami Island We have good experience taking the Zipline to Nami Island during winter time.  Nice scenery from high.
One of my Faves Been here spring and autumn twice, this year for summer. Hope next time winter season.Its pretty and very picturesque. Love the trees.Go on weekdays, early morning for less crowd.

The most beautiful scenic island in south korea When I boarded the tour ferry I felt the wind blowing at my face when I was looking at the island view and it was very magnificent and beautiful.

Try the Zipline You can choose to go Nami Island by Zipline or ferry. We took zipline and it was fun. Family pass can be bought online to skip the queue. It includes 1 x bus trip, 1 x train ride, Cycling and treego at a package price. Island is relatively small, landscaping was a little disappointing.
